headline: Abbott’s (ABT) Exact Sciences Deal is “Very, Very Important,” Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 10 Stocks Jim Cramer Talked About. Abbott Laboratories (NYSE:ABT) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer discussed. This show marked more than a month after Cramer discussed pharmaceuticals and diagnostics devices firm Abbott Laboratories (NYSE:ABT). However, the delay doesn’t mean he’s changed his sentiment about the firm. Cramer often calls Abbott Laboratories […]
